title: News24.com | EFF opens case against Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams for contravening lockdown regulations
description: Speaking shortly after opening a case at the Douglasdale police station in Sandton, EFF spokesperson Vuyani Pambo said Ndabeni-Abrahams had undermined the lockdown which the majority of South Africans were adhering to.
content:
The EFF has opened a case against Communications Minister Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams for allegedly contravening the lockdown regulations. 
This after Ndabeni-Abrahams was pictured having a meal at the home of former deputy minister of higher education Mduduzi M… [+2292 chars]
